Since 1774, Birkenstock continues to attract customers with their long-lasting dedication to a comfortable and supportive shoe. First introduced into the US market in 1966, the company with the iconic jute footbed is safely handcrafted and manufactured in Germany, with the finest quality, sustainable, and natural materials. Each classic footbed is perfectly structured with 4 layers that all play an essential role in the shoe's comfort and construction. The shock-absorbing and flexible cork layer relieves pressure on the foot, while other layers improve the shoe's flexibility, shape, and stability. Lovingly crafted, Birkenstocks are instantly recognizable the world over.

products.name: Wool Car Coat
products.brandedName: Fleurette Wool Car Coat
products.description: Introducing the FLEURETTE Wool Car Coat, the perfect outerwear piece for the stylish and sophisticated woman. Crafted with utmost care and attention to detail, this coat is designed to keep you warm and stylish during the colder seasons.The FLEURETTE Wool Car Coat features a beautiful dark navy color, adding a touch of elegance to your wardrobe. Its timeless design and classic pattern make it a versatile piece that can be effortlessly paired with any outfit.With a length of approximately 30 inches from shoulder to hem, this coat offers the perfect balance of coverage and style. It is tailored to perfection, and the model standing at 5'10' is wearing a size 2. Please note that measurements may vary slightly by size.The FLEURETTE Wool Car Coat is adorned with exquisite design details, including a mock collar and dual front pockets. These elements not only enhance the coat's aesthetics but also provide practicality and convenience.For easy wearability, the coat features a button front closure, allowing you to effortlessly layer it over your favorite outfits. The use of premium 100% wool ensures superior warmth and comfort, making it ideal for chilly days.To maintain the coat's pristine condition, it is recommended to dry clean only. The meticulous craftsmanship and attention to detail put into this garment are a testament to its exceptional quality. It is proudly made in the USA, reflecting the brand's commitment to local manufacturing and supporting American craftsmanship.Elevate your outerwear collection with the FLEURETTE Wool Car Coat, a sophisticated and stylish addition that will effortlessly enhance any outfit. Experience the luxury of this meticulously crafted coat and embrace timeless elegance.

PISTOLA is a premium denim label offering contemporary ready-to-wear collections designed with the modern woman's independent spirit in mind. Founded in 2013 by industry veteran Grace Na, Pistola skillfully blends expert cuts with a streetwise sensibility. Designed in California, PISTOLA garment is meticulously crafted, elevating everyday material with precise fits and utilitarian style edge, to give women thoughtfully designed classics as wardrobe essentials to live in. PISTOLA stands by the guiding principle that high-quality denim is for everyone, forever.

products.description: Take on Summer in confidence in the Baretraps Jaxen sandal. Featuring a modern strappy style and convenient hook and loop closure make these sandals effortlessly chic. A flexible and lightweight outsole ensures easy movement, while the wedge heel adds a touch of sophistication. Enjoy all-day comfort with the cushioned insole, and embrace the open-toe design for a breezy feel that looks great with this year's top summer fashions.

products.name: Hyacinth House Lavender Floral Frannie Maxi Dress
products.brandedName: Hyacinth House Lavender Floral Frannie Maxi Dress
products.unbrandedName: Hyacinth House Lavender Floral Frannie Maxi Dress
products.description: Hyacinth House represents classic femininity while edging on the side of flirty, bohemian, and playful. Through vibrant florals, textured ruffles, and bold patterns, the collection inspires women to embrace their romantic and whimsical side, seeking adventure, excitement, and celebration. The Lavender Floral Frannie Maxi Dress is an elegant addition to your warm-weather closet. A feminine silhouette featuring short puff sleeves, an adjustable drawstring waist, and a tiered ruffle skirt, this look is perfect for brunches, luncheons, showers, and everything in between! Simply pair with your favorite sandals or espadrilles and you are ready to go. Crew neckline Short puff sleeves Front button placket Adjustable self-tie waist Wide ruffle hem Lined Maxi length Material: 100% Cotton (outer & lining) Care: Hand wash cold, do not bleach, low iron, do not tumble dry
